title: Today Judge Sotomayor Questionnaire Delivery | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




June 04, 2009

 



Today Judge Sotomayor Questionnaire Delivery




THE WHITE HOUSE  Office of the Press Secretary   ____________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE         June 4, 2009 Today, at 2:00PM EDT, the White House will deliver Judge Sonia Sotomayor’s questionnaire to the Senate Judiciary Committee – just 9 days after being nominated to the Supreme Court.  For context, this is the swiftest questionnaire completion in recent history.  Based on the time between a nominee’s designation and when they returned their questionnaire, it took Chief Justice Roberts 13 days, Justice Ginsburg 15 days and Justice Alito 30 days to complete their questionnaires.     ##
